rules_text:
When Fungalflurry Snail attacks, you may put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}: Fungalflurry Snail explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
